name: Open Beta
description:
The game was supposed to be a Quake/Doom clone-ish. But because of some IRL stuff and lack of motivation i couldnt continue the game any longer. But leaving the game to waste entirely is also hard to do, so here is a prototype/tech demo i created from the things i have made so far.

The future of the project is quite unknown, either i continue it or i would use the source code for other projects. But until that comes, please enjoy this little game

- Mad Calcium
